runs.comm: full on leg stump to start with, Gayle flicks towards deep square leg
he can play on that's what! Marshall pushes forward tentatively and gets a bottom edge on to his leg stump, the ball dislodges just one bail, what a disappointment for Marshall
defended on the front foot

bowled him! Round his legs that too! Mathews bowled a length ball angling towards leg stump, Simmons moved across his crease, trying to glance towards fine leg, he moved too far across and the ball clipped leg stump, that ball actually clipped the underneath of Simmons' thigh pad and deviated on to the stump
Bravo, who's had to pad up in a tearing hurry, pushes the first ball towards cover

that's another one bowled! Mathews pitched the ball on a length outside off stump, Bravo was in two minds, undecided between playing or leaving it, he began to push at it before trying to pull his bat out of the way, the ball went off the inside edge to uproot middle stump
left alone outside off stump, Gayle must be stunned at what's happened at the other end
he's left another one outside off stump
good length on off stump, defended towards cover
good length on leg and middle, Gayle defends on the leg side
he nearly played on there! Gayle tried to pull but got a bottom edge close to his stumps, what's going on? Gayle somehow sees the funny side of things
punched off the back foot towards long-on for a single, West Indies are 2 for 3, 2 for 3!!
edged and four! Gayle pushes forward at a full ball slanting away from him and gets an outside edge past gully, the ball runs down to the third man boundary
beaten! Mathews pitches short of a length and seams the ball away from the left-hander, Gayle fends and misses
Gayle lets the ball go again outside off stump
and again, he's not playing Mathews is Gayle, he's letting it go outside off
Gayle moves forward to a fuller ball and drives firmly towards cover where the fielder makes a sharp save
good length outside off stump with a hint of movement away from Chanderpaul, he lets it go, West Indian supporters in the crowd are shell shocked
full and straight, Gayle covers his stumps and blocks
that's a Harmison, ok it wasn't that wide but Malinga's slower ball slipped and went off the pitch
this time the slower ball is on target and Gayle gets beaten
edged and four again! Gayle pushes at the ball and a thick outside edge flies past first slip towards third man
shot! Gayle punches a low full toss firmly down the ground, the fielders have no chance
another slower ball, Gayle isn't spotting the change of pace and defends late on the off side
Malinga pitches outside leg stump and Gayle helps the ball down to fine leg with a glance off his pads
Chanderpaul moves towards the off side and nudges the ball towards leg, he exposed all his stumps there
length ball on middle and off stump, Chanderpaul moves towards the off and defends
What's he trying? Chanderpaul moved across and attempted to swat a ball that was far too full and outside off stump
full ball outside off stump, Chanderpaul drives towards extra cover
played off the back foot towards cover
he's beaten Gayle again with one that pitched in line with the stumps and seamed away, Gayle simply prodded at it and the ball zipped past the outside edge
Chanderpaul once again moves across to try and work the ball towards fine leg but doesn't make contact
played off the back foot behind square for a single
Udana slants a ball down leg side, that was slower and was extremely close to leg stump, Gayle missed the leg glance
that's disappeared into the crowds! Gayle picked the slower ball this time, got under it, and hammered the ball over long-on, huge hit
that's definitely wide, Udana's slower one was very wide of leg stump
full and straight on off stump, Gayle stays back and defends towards point
that was very slow and Gayle had finished playing the pull when the ball reached him, it looped over the stumps
driven down the ground for a single
Gayle strides forward and pushes the ball towards cover
full and in the block hole, Gayle drives to long-off
Mendis pitches on leg, Chanderpaul moves across and sweeps towards fine leg
defended back towards the bowler on the front foot
Chanderpaul steps out to take the ball on the full and chips it towards midwicket
Chanderpaul charges and swings across the line but only gets a bottom edge on the leg side
Chanderpaul stays in his crease this time and cuts towards third man
Gayle heaves across the line at a length delivery from Mathews and gets a bottom edge past his stumps
Gayle cuts this time and places the ball through point, there's a bit of hesitation between the batsmen but they come back for two
that's hit with tremendous force down the ground, there's a fielder at long-off but he could barely move before the ball crashed into the ad hoardings
Gayle drives hard again, this time to long-off, Chanderpaul comes back for the second, Mathews finishes with 3 for 16, what a sensational spell
defended on the off side

that's plumb! Chanderpaul moved too far across his stumps and tried to sweep, he missed and Mendis hit him flush on the pad, that ball pitched in line and would have gone on to hit middle, it skidded on to Chanderpaul
Mendis slips down leg side this time and Sarwan gets it away towards fine leg
defended on the front foot towards the bowler, there's a slip and a forward short leg in place
full and straight, Sarwan drives back to the bowler
Sarwan tries to force the ball through the off side but did not read the googly, he gets an inside edge
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Gayle paddles the first ball past short fine leg for four, a rare loose ball from Murali
full on leg stump, Gayle sweeps powerfully towards deep square leg
Murali goes round the wicket and drifts the ball across Sarwan who drives towards long on off the front foot
Gayle steps forward but gets beaten in the flight and has to defend
a bit of width on offer outside off and Gayle cuts to deep point
Sarwan steps out of his crease and plays to long off
he kisses the ball for luck, runs in, and bowls a slow wide outside off stump, Sarwan didn't pick it though
terrific slower bouncer, Sarwan sees it too late and has to abort his attempt to pull, Sanga fumbles and they run a bye
played off the back foot behind square for one
this one isn't slow, it's full outside off stump at 138 kmh, Sarwan swings and misses, that was a slog
dropped! Sarwan gets under a slower one and hits it high in the air towards long-on where Mendis completely mis-judges it, even the camera lost the ball so it must have been difficult to spot
played towards point off the back foot
too full on the pads and Gayle flicks past short fine leg, poor line when the fielder is in the circle

caught! Sarwan charges Murali and tries to hit the ball out of the ground, he doesn't get to the pitch of the ball and is also cramped for room by Murali's line from round the wicket, he lofts straight to Mathews at long-on who takes an easy catch, he's having a terrific day

Gayle has a bit of width and that's all he needs, he cuts the ball hard towards deep point and only a terrific effort from Silva saves the four. He stopped the ball with his legs, goes over, jumps back into play and flicks the ball away from the rope while he's in the air ... oh but he pushed the rope back during that effort and the ball rolled on to where the boundary rope would have been
Gayle misses the  cut this time, that was flatter and quicker from Murali
Gayle works the ball off his pads towards square leg to reach his 50, he's carrying West Indies' hopes
defended on the back foot by Pollard
Murali slips one down leg side, that's close to the stumps but it's been called wide
driven to long on for one
Pollard gets pinned on the back foot by Mendis, he gets hit on the pad but it would have missed leg
Pollard defends on the front foot
played back to the bowler, WI can't afford these dots
he's not picking him at all, Mendis skids the ball past Pollard's attempted cut

Sangakkara's stumped him! Or has he? Mendis drew Pollard forward with his length and got the ball to deviate away from the right-hander, beating the bat, Pollard dragged his back foot but never really took it off the ground, he got back just in time
Pollard plays the last ball through midwicket for a single. Only one of the over when West Indies needed 11, incredible stuff from Mendis
loud appeal for lbw as Pollard pushes forward and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Gayle rocks back and pulls against the turn across him towards long on
another confident appeal for lbw, Pollard lunges forward but doesn't read the offbreak and gets hit on the pad

stumped down the leg side! Murali pitches on leg stump and draws Pollard forward, the ball spins past Pollard's pads, leaving him stranded, Sangakkara anticipates the opportunity and moves to his left and whips off the bails in a flash
Ramdin chips the ball in the air towards mid on
Gayle moves back and works the ball behind square, he's got off strike and that's not what West Indies want
played off the pads towards square
slower one outside off stump, Gayle lets it go!!
slow ball and Gayle mis-times the pull for only a single
too full on the pads and Ramdin flicks superbly towards the deep backward square leg boundary
slower ball and Ramdin plays an awkward looking sweep but has hit it well enough to get four, he split the gap at deep backward square
another slower ball and Ramdin's holed out! He tried to loft it inside out over cover but only managed to give Jayawardene a catch, excellent change of pace
full toss on leg stump, Taylor flicks to deep square leg and a fumble on the boundary allows the second
SIX! SIX! Gayle rocks back, latches on to a short ball and hammers it over square leg, awesome power
flatter and quicker, Gayle moves back and nudges towards midwicket, Gayle loses strike
caught! Taylor tries to clear the midwicket boundary but doesn't even clear the inner circle, Kulasekara takes the catch
Gayle hammers the ball again but straight to long-on this time
Sammy pushes forward and gets beaten by one that drifts across him
cut off the back foot towards backward point, Gayle won't have the strike again, he's been given shockingly inadequate support from his team-mates
Sammy gets beaten by one from Mendis that moves away from him
another one goes, feeble feeble batting, Sammy tries to clear the infield but slices the ball in the air towards point where Mubarak takes the catch, they simply need to give Gayle the strike
Mendis slips one down leg side, that's a wide
Gayle strides forward and defends towards the off side, he takes the single
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
full and straight again, Benn defends back to the bowler
Benn tries to sweep but can't make contact
full and wide outside off stump, Gayle winds up and swings hard but can't make contact
a slower ball and it's wide down leg side
excellent ball from Malinga, tight length and straight, Gayle gets behind the line and blocks
another slower ball, Gayle can't do much but punch it towards long-off, he takes the single
Malinga's sealed Sri Lanka's place in the final with a searing yorker that crashes into the stumps, that ball completes a fearsome defence
